cv.title: Curriculum Vitae
cv.subtitle: Backend Developer with holistic product vision

intro.title: About Me
intro.paragraph1: I'm a Backend Developer specialized in creating scalable and robust solutions. With experience in Node.js, TypeScript, and both relational and NoSQL databases, I focus on building efficient architectures that support the growth and evolution of digital products.
intro.paragraph2: My holistic view of software development allows me to understand and collaborate effectively with all areas involved in creating technological products, from user experience to infrastructure.
